document_data.mainbody: 'Demihuman'''" was a collective name for races that were not [[human]] but had a similar appearance. Among them were peoples of the [[dwarf|dwarves]], [[elf|elves]] (including [[drow]]), [[halfling]]s, and [[gnome]]s.<ref><ref> [[Half-elf]]s and [[half-orc]]s held a special position, as they were indeed half human.<ref>
